typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Sales_Month as date,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Species_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MapColumns
MapColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Month as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

MasterPipeline.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx-Certifications

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Certification_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.Certifications}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx
Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT FROM (
 SELECT DISTINCT LIS.Work_Book, LIS.Work_Sheet FROM 
 audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List LIS
 JOIN audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error ERR
 ON LIS.Work_Book = ERR.Source_File  
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = ERR.Source_Sub_File
 WHERE LIS.Work_Book = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}'
 AND LIS.Work_Sheet = '@{pipeline().parameters.TimberSales}'
)x

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_COA_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MYO_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM staging.Forecast_Asset_reference
  WHERE Validation_Error IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FX_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FUND_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[Myob_Actuals]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL
